body.description: Start ACTing to help prevent cavities, whiten teeth and freshen breath. ACT Whitening + Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash is formulated to help whiten teeth with no dyes and no alcohol. In fact, you can enjoy a whiter smile in just four days** when you rinse with ACT Whitening Mouthwash. This alcohol-free mouthwash also kills bad breath germs. When it comes to brighter smiles, trust the No. 1 dentist recommended fluoride brand*. *Among mouth rinses **vs. baseline when used as directed ***As part of a regular dental hygiene routine that includes brushing, flossing, and rinsing with a fluoride mouthwash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your mouthwash should do more. Find the right solution for you. Superior Cavity Protection Formulated to strengthen teeth and prevent tooth decay, this fluoride mouthwash is alcohol free and comes in three invigorating flavors: Mint, Cinnamon, and Arctic Blast. Strengthens Enamel Help fight cavities with ACT Restoring Mouthwash. It strengthens enamel by remineralizing soft spots for up to 4x stronger teeth. Choose from alcohol-free Mint Burst or invigorating Cool Mint. *In lab studies vs. rinsing with water (baseline). Applies only to 0.05% fluoride formulas. Kills Bad Breath Germs Kiss bad breath goodbye! ACT Total Care Mouthwash provides the same anticavity protection you expect, plus it kills bad breath germs. Swish once a day with Zero Alcohol Fresh Mint or invigorating Icy Clean Mint to prevent cavities, strengthen teeth, and freshen breath. Removes Surface Stains See a whiter smile in four days.* This anticavity mouthwash helps remove surface stains with every swish, plus strengthens enamel and kills bad breath germs. The dye-free and alcohol-free formula comes in Gentle Mint Flavor. *vs. baseline

The ACT Triple Action Formula Freshens, Strengthens and Protects Teeth Freshens Breath So fresh, so clean! All ACT Anticavity Mouthwashes are designed to bust bad breath every time you rinse. Strengthens Out of all fluoride mouth rinses, ACT is the #1 dentist recommended brand.** It’s designed to strengthen enamel for up to 4x stronger teeth.* *In lab studies vs. rinsing with water (baseline). Applies only to 0.05% fluoride formulas. **Among mouth rinses Protects Against Cavities ACT Fluoride Mouthwash helps you go beyond brushing to prevent tooth decay. It strengthens teeth to deliver superior cavity protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to mouthwash, it really does whiten well but you need to give it like a week of daily use for around a minute each time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My dentist recommended I get a fluoride mouthwash and I decided on this one after weighing a few different options. It’s great! Tastes good and not too overwhelmingly minty like most others I’ve tried. I truly feel like my teeth have gotten whiter in just a couple days! Now I have my husband hooked on it too so I guess we’ll be buying more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad my dentist recommended this mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: ACT Whitening Mouthwash is a product that I was recommended by my dentist, and I'm glad she did. After finishing my first bottle, I can confidently say that it is a great choice for those looking to brighten their teeth. In fact, both my husband and I really like it, and he's usually quite picky about these types of products.Aside from its effective hydrogen peroxide formula, I appreciate the refreshing minty taste of the mouthwash, which leaves my mouth feeling clean and fresh. It also doesn't cause any burning or irritation, even with regular use.One of the best things about ACT Whitening Mouthwash is its great value. It's affordable and effective, making it a great alternative to more expensive professional treatments. In fact, I've already repurchased it after finishing my first bottle.However, as with any whitening product, it's worth being mindful of potential sensitivity or irritation.Overall, I highly recommend ACT Whitening Mouthwash to anyone looking to whiten their teeth. Its effective formula, refreshing taste, and great value make it a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was using this every day and after a while a couple of my teeth became very sensitive. I stopped using it and the condition went away. That said this product did help whiten my teeth a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works. BE PATIENT!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried other whitening products in the past and not been impressed. I found Crest Whitestrips messy and uncomfortable to use. I went through about 5 tubes of Crest whitening toothpaste and couldn't see any real change. So I was a bit skeptical about this product, especially the claim that you will notice a change after 4 days of use. I didn't see noticeable change after the first week. Still, my teeth took a lot of years to get discolored, so I decided to continue. As I was nearing the end of my second bottle, even this old skeptic became convinced that there was a definite effect. My teeth aren't "Hollywood white," but they are improving. I'm hoping for continued slow improvement as I continue to use the product. So don't get discouraged if you don't see much change at first. This stuff is easy to use, the flavor is acceptable, and it may very well work for you if you persist. Plus you are getting the added benefit of the additional fluoride. Anything that lessens the likelihood of needing dental work is a win in my book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than any other whitening rinse I've used

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bottle is small. I expected the larger size.
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure if it's whitening at all.I drink a lot of coffee and I am careful to not drink for more than 30 minutes being mindful of the effects of PH balance, and I'm careful to swish with fresh water or this whitening mouth wash directly after, but I don't see a difference after 10 days of using this at least 2x per day, and after some coffee drinks, in a row.I'll keep using it until the package is complete but I can get a bottle on the equivalent ACT non-whitening non-alcoholic mouthwash that is at least 2x larger from walmart for the same price as this. If this was whitening, I would not mind - but the value just doesn't seem to be there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am lazy about whitening my teeth so a swish of this for a minute, then I don't rinse with water for another minute or two. Noticeable difference after one use.
